About Me

Essentially, we wait for confirmation that the .writeFile() method ran successfully. When we get that confirmation, which in this case simply means not receiving an error, we then execute the .copyFile() method. It isn't mandatory for the application to work, but it does make the application run its functions one at a time, making it easier for us to track what's going on when.

Work

Weather Dashboard

Built With: HTML,CSS,jQuery,Bootstrap

Developers are often tasked with retrieving data from another application's API and using it in the context of their own. Third-party APIs allow developers to access their data and functionality by making requests with specific parameters to a URL. Your challenge is to build a weather dashboard that will run in the browser and feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS.
